## Criterion.uri property

The URI of this criterion.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get uri(): Criterion.URI<C, "2.1" | "2.2">;
```

## Remarks

The `Requirement` class requires a single URI for each requirement and so we can't branch of the criterion version. We therefore pick the most stable URI and use that.
